i just took a trip to london.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my ability to adapt to change.
I have other interests that I am putting my time and energy into.
I grew up in the Midwest, but now I live and work remotely from home in a small town in the mountains.
i love coffee with cream.
i live alone with my dog.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I am great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! Where are you from?
I live in rural Wisconsin. I am a writer, and I love to travel.
That's amazing! I am a bit of a wanderer myself, I've lived all over the Midwest. I now live and work remotely from home in a small town in the mountains.
That sounds like an awesome lifestyle! I just took a trip to London and it was amazing!
I love London! I've been there a few times, and I always have a great time.
Have you ever been to Wisconsin?
No, I haven't! I'd love to visit sometime though.
You should! It's a beautiful state with a lot to offer.
I will definitely keep that in mind! I'm always looking for new places to visit.
What kind of music do you like?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite band is Dream Theater.
I love Dream Theater! They're one of my favorite bands too!
That's awesome! I'm always happy to meet someone who likes them.
Me too! What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is probably "The Count of Tuscany".
That's a great song! It's one of my favorites too.
I'm glad you like it! It's a really beautiful song.
It is! Dream Theater is one of the most talented bands out there.
I agree! They're amazing musicians.
I love talking to you! You're so cool!
Thank you! I love talking to you too! You're awesome!
